name: Astralis Slot Machine
description: A fully featured slot machine with spinning reels, win animations, and celebration effects
author: Astralis Motion Team

stateMachines.name: SlotMachineSM
stateMachines.description: Main state machine controlling slot machine behavior

inputs.name: isSpinning
inputs.description: Controls whether the reels are spinning

inputs.name: spinSpeed
inputs.description: Speed multiplier for the spin animation

inputs.name: winAmount
inputs.description: The amount won, triggers celebration animation when > 0

inputs.name: triggerSpin
inputs.description: Triggers a new spin of the reels

inputs.name: stopReels
inputs.description: Stops the reels at their final position

events.name: SpinStarted
events.description: Fired when the reels begin spinning

events.name: SpinComplete
events.description: Fired when all reels have stopped

events.name: WinSequenceComplete
events.description: Fired when the win celebration animation finishes

events.name: ReelStopped
events.description: Fired each time an individual reel stops

dataBindings.name: reelSymbols
dataBindings.description: Array of symbols to display on the reels

dataBindings.name: payoutTable
dataBindings.description: Configuration for win conditions and payouts
